nodes.text: Queyta was a planet in the Outer Rim's Danjar sector.
In 22 BBY, a Separatist base was located on Queyta.
Four Jedi Masters (Nico Diath, Fay, Jon Antilles, and Knol Ven'nari) visited the base and were killed there by Asajj Ventress and Durge, with Obi-Wan Kenobi being the sole survivor.
Their sacrifice allowed Obi-Wan Kenobi to obtain the antidote to Jenna Zan Arbor's swamp gas.
